WindowPrompt.summary: window.prompt() instructs the browser to display a dialog with an optional message prompting the user to input some text, and to wait until the user either submits the text or cancels the dialog.

remarks.para: Under some conditions — for example, when the user switches tabs — the browser may not actually display a dialog, or may not wait for the user to submit text or to cancel the dialog.

WindowPrompt.returns: A string containing the text entered by the user, or null.
